column2: Tracks the location of nearby solar bodies.
Each perk you pick up increases your movement speed slightly.
Enemies will always drop their souls.
Guarantees enemies drop their soul when they die
Causes enemies in a large field to drop their souls on death
Consumes a portion of your souls to increase a projectile's damage
No Ikkuna. This is not a portal.
Expels a soul in the form of a magical projectile
Increases the power and speed of your spells at the cost of a soul
Enables your wand to cut the souls from your enemies
Detonates a soul to produce an explosion
Rain down bombs and also poison
Emits a laser to assist with aiming
there but for the grace of God go I
Makes a projectile move towards your foes in a random manner
A not so weak but enchanting sparkling projectile
Converts nearby materials to lava upon landing
Makes any blood within a projectile's range turns into steam
Makes enemies cast a copy of the spell on death
The next spell is casted with a soul instead of using mana
All enemies on screen are marked to drop their soul
Converts your Gilded souls into gold
Casts the whole wand with souls instead of mana
Releases up to eight souls to guard you from harm and reap nearby enemies
Cast once to mark a point and cast again to return to that point
Enemies drop a random soul on death
Guarantees enemies drop a gilded soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a mage soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a fly soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a spider soul when they die
Enemies drop two souls when they die
Expels a soul in the form of a bouncing projectile
Your souls become minions to fight and reap for you
Soul minions are converted into healing fields
